'''Ropers''' were those whose occupation was to create rope. While all races undoubtedly had rope makers, in [[Lothlórien]] the [[Elves]] used ''[[hithlain]]'' to make a superior rope that was grey and silky to the touch.<ref>{{FR|II8}}</ref> In [[the Shire]], some ancestors of [[Samwise Gamgee]] took up the occupation of rope making and even used the word "Roper" as a surname:<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>
 
# [[Hob Gammidge]] acquired the epithet of "the Roper".
# [[Hobson]] was known by the nickname of "Roper Gamgee".
# [[Andwise Roper]], following in the footsteps of his grandfather and father, established "Roper" as his last name.
# [[Anson Roper]] continued the use of his father's last name.
